thread.title: One Direction share 'Perfect' video just hours after cancelling Belfast gig due to ill health
thread.title_full: One Direction share 'Perfect' video just hours after cancelling Belfast gig due to ill health

title: One Direction share 'Perfect' video just hours after cancelling Belfast gig due to ill health
text: One Direction share 'Perfect' video just hours after cancelling Belfast gig due to ill health Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Video sees band hanging out in a New York hotel The Heart-Crushing Moment One Direction's Belfast Concert Is Cancelled 02:36 There were many disappointed fans emerging from Belfast’s SSE Arena on October 20 after a One Direction concert was cancelled at the last minute. According to a statement from the SSE Arena , Liam became ill and was unable to perform. This video shows the announcement being made inside the arena,... Recent related news LONDON — One Direction fans in Belfast were overwhelmingly disappointed and distraught Tuesday night after the band cancelled their show two minutes before... Mashable 1 hour ago - Internet Also reported by • Western Daily Press You Might Like
